p: The following hardware and software is required to run TEAM Mentor.

Please note that it may be possible to run TEAM Mentor with less RAM and Storage. However performance does degrade under load and minimal configuration listed above is recommended for production environments. Also note, when connecting to TEAM Mentor on local machine (connecting to "localhost") SSL certificate is not required. Self-signed certificate may be used for test environments.
Following browsers and platforms are supported:
TM 4.0 Jade supports all browsers including IE8. Mobile browsers for Android and iOS are also supported.
TM 3.6 Back0-end (used for Administration and Editing) supports the following browsers
ul:
Windows 2012 R2 (64 Bit) with IIS 8.0 or higher
 NET Framework 4.5.1 ( You can download this version from http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40779 )
 Git Version Control with Tools ( Available at https://github.com/msysgit/git ) 
 NodeJS ( Distributed with TEAM Mentor ZIP File  ) 
 IIS AAR 3.0 Extension ( Distributed with TEAM Mentor ZIP File ) 
 IIS URLRewrite2 Extension ( Distributed with TEAM Mentor ZIP File ) 
 4GB of RAM
 4GB of Storage
 SSL Certificate

IE 11
 Firefox
 Chrome
 Safari (v6.1 and v7.0 on OSX only)

html:
Minimum Server Requirements

The following hardware and software is required to run TEAM Mentor.

Server Side Requirements

  • Windows 2012 R2 (64 Bit) with IIS 8.0 or higher
  • NET Framework 4.5.1 ( You can download this version from http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40779 )
  • Git Version Control with Tools ( Available at https://github.com/msysgit/git )
  • NodeJS ( Distributed with TEAM Mentor ZIP File )
  • IIS AAR 3.0 Extension ( Distributed with TEAM Mentor ZIP File )
  • IIS URLRewrite2 Extension ( Distributed with TEAM Mentor ZIP File )
  • 4GB of RAM
  • 4GB of Storage
  • SSL Certificate

Please note that it may be possible to run TEAM Mentor with less RAM and Storage. However performance does degrade under load and minimal configuration listed above is recommended for production environments. Also note, when connecting to TEAM Mentor on local machine (connecting to "localhost") SSL certificate is not required. Self-signed certificate may be used for test environments.

Client Side Requirements

Following browsers and platforms are supported:

TM 4.0 Jade supports all browsers including IE8. Mobile browsers for Android and iOS are also supported.

TM 3.6 Back0-end (used for Administration and Editing) supports the following browsers

  • IE 11
  • Firefox
  • Chrome
  • Safari (v6.1 and v7.0 on OSX only)
